verses.roman:
āra dina sabe paramānanda-purī-sthāne
'prabhuke prasanna kara'--kailā nivedane

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; sabe—all the devotees; paramānanda-purī-sthāne—at the place of Paramānanda Purī; prabhuke—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prasanna kara—please try to pacify; kailā nivedane—submitted.
translation: The next day, all the devotees went to Śrī Paramānanda Purī and requested him to pacify the Lord.
